artist: Artist: Jean-Pierre Norblin de la Gourdaine
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: illuminated figure in white at center, raising PR hand upward; in shadows at L, an arm extends out of a narrow, sunken area in the ground; crowd of onlookers watch in awe in background; large pillars and stone structure in background
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Raising of Lazarus (Large Plate)
